item.title: Gradual Domain Adaptation via Manifold-Constrained Distributionally Robust Optimization
item.description: This paper introduces DRODA, a novel method guaranteeing bounded error in gradual domain adaptation by leveraging manifold constraints and adaptive Wasserstein radii.
